title: [Allyiah's Outfitting]
[Allyiah's General Store]
description: A blue watered silk tapestry hangs on one of the glossy mistwood walls, and a mistwood beam ceiling rises overhead.  An elegantly dressed maiden statue sits in one corner of an enameled hardwood floor.  There is a hammered copper hanging rack on one side of the shop and a glass-topped mistwood counter on the other.

A blue watered silk tapestry hangs on one of the glossy mistwood walls, and a mistwood beam ceiling rises overhead.  An elegantly dressed maiden statue sits in one corner of an enameled hardwood floor.  There is a gold-leafed mistwood cabinet on one side of the shop and a glass-topped mistwood counter on the other.
